definition: loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: All you need is a shortcrust pastry, a well made egg custard, and a sprinkling of nutmeg.
sentences.chinese: 所有你需要的只是，一个油酥松饼，蛋，和肉豆蔻洒。

sentences.english: Evenly divide the mixture, approximately 2 tablespoons per cup, among the muffin cups.
sentences.chinese: 平分混合物，大约每杯2勺，放在松饼杯里。

sentences.english: Bake approx 30 minutes until golden brown.
sentences.chinese: 烘烤30分钟左右，直到松饼呈金棕色。

sentences.english: For example, one week you might bring in muffins for no reason.
sentences.chinese: 举例来说，这周你可以从家带些松饼与同事分享。

sentences.english: Evenly divide the mixture approximately 2 tablespoons per cup among the muffin cups. < o<="" span="">
sentences.chinese: 平分混合物，大约每杯2勺，放在松饼杯里。

sentences.english: Do You Know The Muffin Man ?
About 1-2 min before time is up, toast English muffins next to burgers.
sentences.chinese: 烹调时间尚馀1分钟时，放入英式松饼同时烘烤。

sentences.english: Now we all know the Muffin Man .
sentences.chinese: 现在我们大家都认识松饼人。

sentences.english: Oh, do you know the muffin man, who lives on Wonder Lane?
sentences.chinese: 喔，你认识住在奇异巷里的松饼先生吗？

sentences.english: Would a carrot crumpet make you feel better?
sentences.chinese: 来块胡萝卜松饼能让你好点吗？

sentences.english: Fill all but one section of the muffin tin, then stir the last bit of batter several minutes more.
sentences.chinese: 将一个松饼罐灌满，然后将剩下的糊糊多搅拌几分钟。

sentences.english: Two Eggs Scrambled with Smoked Salmon, topped with Sour Cream and Chives on an English Muffin.
sentences.chinese: 烟熏三文鱼炒蛋，配以酸奶油，香葱和英式松饼。

sentences.english: Oh, yes we know the muffin man, Who lives in Dury Lane.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我们认识那个住在丢瑞街的那个做松饼的人。

sentences.english: Oh, yes we've seen the muffin man.
sentences.chinese: 噢，是的，我们看到过那个松饼人。

sentences.english: Yes, I know the muffin man, who Iives on Drury Lane?
sentences.chinese: 对，我知道松饼人，她住在特鲁里街？

definition: cookie (loanword via Cantonese 曲奇 kuk1 kei4)
